name: Heroes' Strike - The first 4vs4 Moba Realtime
name_original: Heroes' Strike - The first 4vs4 Moba Realtime
description:
Heroes' Strike - The first 4vs4 Moba Realtime is an action game developed by WolfFun.
You can play Heroes' Strike - The first 4vs4 Moba Realtime on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
